Package org.wildfly.security.credential

Class X509CertificateChainPublicCredential

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wildfly.security.credential.X509CertificateChainPublicCredential
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, AlgorithmCredential, Credential, X509CertificateChainCredential
    public final class X509CertificateChainPublicCredential
extends java.lang.Object
    A credential containing an X.509 certificate chain.
    Author:
    David M. Lloyd
